welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fredericia, a charming coastal city known for its rich history and picturesque surroundings. We hope you have a lovely stay and take the time to discover all the beauty and culture this city has to offer. Enjoy your visit!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maamigili Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beldringe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Beldringe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Billund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for charter flights and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.
